title: Himi 22
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Na’e tāupe ‘a e ‘Eiki
‘I he ‘akau kovi,
Pea na’e pekia ai
‘I he’etau hia.
2.
Pea ke mou fakaongo
Ki he’ene to’e,
Lolotonga ‘ene tautau
‘I he ‘akau kovi.
3.
Na’e fakapo’uli ai
‘A e la’ā foki,
Hoko mo e mofuike
Fakamanavahē.
4.
Pea mafahifahi ai
‘A e ngaahi maka,
Pea matangaki hake
‘A e tanu’anga.
5.
Pea mo e puipui
‘I he temipale
Na’e mahae ua ia
Pea ava leva.
6.
Pea na’e tangi ia
‘I he le’o lahi,
“Kuo ‘osi, ke ke ma’u
Hoku laumālie.” *
